name: Robbers Run: Most Wanted - Escape Cops And Jail
name_original: Robbers Run: Most Wanted - Escape Cops And Jail
description:
Run! Cops are coming!!!
Drive your vehicles through highway traffic, jump over a lot of obstacles and change lanes to avoid other cars and don't let cops catch you. How far can you go ?

◉ Swipe up or down to change lanes.
◉ Swipe to the right or tap to jump over an obstacle.
◉ Avoid the cars and collect coins.
◉ Run and claim a lot of achievements.
◉ Daily spin to get coin and gears.

Have fun!
